text: My name is Semhar Sium from Eritrea. I have studied Accounting in my country and in Switzerland I have learned coding in powercoders, a coding academy for refugees. CurrentlyI am doing my internship in Namics AG as Junior Software Engineer. I am very excited to learn a lot and gain valuable experience from a great and talentedteam to join as an intern in a Swiss company. Please visit my About page if you want to know more about me.Thank you for taking the time to visit mywebsite.Have a great day !
